comments: Connects a Proxy of a Record Resource to a Proxy of another Record Resource that it precedes directly in some sequence (not necessarily defined or characterised chronologically).

properties.label: proxy follows in sequence
properties.description: Inverse of 'precedes proxy in sequence' object property.
comments: Inverse of 'precedes proxy in sequence' object property.

properties.label: proxy follows proxy in sequence transitive
properties.description: Inverse of 'proxy recedes proxy in sequence transitive' object property.
comments: Inverse of 'proxy recedes proxy in sequence transitive' object property.

properties.label: proxy for
properties.description: Connects a Proxy to the Record Resource it stands for in the context of a specific Record Resource.
comments: Connects a Proxy to the Record Resource it stands for in the context of a specific Record Resource.

properties.label: proxy has constituent
properties.description: Inverse of 'is constituent of proxy' object property.
comments: Inverse of 'is constituent of proxy' object property.

properties.label: proxy has constituent proxy transitive
properties.description: Inverse of 'proxy is constituent of proxy transitive' object property. This is a transitive relation.
comments: Inverse of 'proxy is constituent of proxy transitive' object property. This is a transitive relation.

properties.label: proxy has direct constituent
properties.description: Inverse of 'is direct constituent of proxy' object property.
comments: Inverse of 'is direct constituent of proxy' object property.

properties.label: proxy has direct constituent proxy
properties.description: Inverse of 'proxy is direct constituent of' object property.
comments: Inverse of 'proxy is direct constituent of' object property.

properties.label: proxy in
properties.description: Connects a Proxy to the Record Resource in which it stands for (represents) another Record Resource.
comments: Connects a Proxy to the Record Resource in which it stands for (represents) another Record Resource.

properties.label: proxy in record
properties.description: Connects a Proxy to a Record in which it stands for (represents) a Record Part or another Record.
comments: Connects a Proxy to a Record in which it stands for (represents) a Record Part or another Record.

properties.label: proxy in record set
properties.description: Connects a Proxy to a Record Set in which it stands for (represents) a Record or another Record Set.
comments: Connects a Proxy to a Record Set in which it stands for (represents) a Record or another Record Set.

properties.label: proxy includes
properties.description: Inverse of 'is included in proxy' object property.
comments: Inverse of 'is included in proxy' object property.

properties.label: proxy includes proxy transitive
properties.description: Inverse of 'proxy is included in proxy transitive' object property. This is a transitive relation.
comments: Inverse of 'proxy is included in proxy transitive' object property. This is a transitive relation.

properties.label: proxy is constituent of
properties.description: Connects a Proxy of a Record or Record Part to a Record or Record Part which it is a constituent of, directly or indirectly.
comments: Connects a Proxy of a Record or Record Part to a Record or Record Part which it is a constituent of, directly or indirectly.

properties.label: proxy is constituent of proxy transitive
properties.description: Connects a Proxy of a Record or Record Part to a Proxy of another Record or Record Part which it is a constituent of, directly or indirectly. This is a transitive relation.
comments: Connects a Proxy of a Record or Record Part to a Proxy of another Record or Record Part which it is a constituent of, directly or indirectly. This is a transitive relation.

properties.label: proxy is direct constituent of
properties.description: Connects a Proxy of a Record or Record Part to another Record or Record Part which the first is a direct constituent of.
comments: Connects a Proxy of a Record or Record Part to another Record or Record Part which the first is a direct constituent of.

properties.label: proxy is direct constituent of proxy
properties.description: Connects a Proxy of a Record or Record Part to a Proxy of another Record or Record Part of which the first is a direct constituent.
comments: Connects a Proxy of a Record or Record Part to a Proxy of another Record or Record Part of which the first is a direct constituent.

properties.label: proxy is directly included in
properties.description: Connects a Proxy of a Record or Record Set to another Record Set which the first is directly included in.
comments: Connects a Proxy of a Record or Record Set to another Record Set which the first is directly included in.

properties.label: proxy is directly included in proxy
properties.description: Connects a Proxy of a Record or Record Set to a Proxy of a Record Set which it is directly included in.
comments: Connects a Proxy of a Record or Record Set to a Proxy of a Record Set which it is directly included in.

properties.label: proxy is included in
properties.description: Connects a Proxy of a Record or Record Set to a Record Set which it is included in, directly or indirectly.
comments: Connects a Proxy of a Record or Record Set to a Record Set which it is included in, directly or indirectly.

properties.label: proxy is included in proxy transitive
properties.description: Connects a Proxy of a Record or Record Set to a Proxy of a Record Set which it is included in, directly or indirectly. This is a transitive relation.
comments: Connects a Proxy of a Record or Record Set to a Proxy of a Record Set which it is included in, directly or indirectly. This is a transitive relation.

properties.label: proxy precedes in sequence
properties.description: Connects a Proxy of a Record Resource to a Record Resource which the first precedes directly or indirectly in some sequence (not necessarily defined or characterised chronologically).
comments: Connects a Proxy of a Record Resource to a Record Resource which the first precedes directly or indirectly in some sequence (not necessarily defined or characterised chronologically).

properties.label: proxy precedes proxy in sequence transitive
properties.description: Connects a Proxy of a Record Resource to a Proxy of another Record Resource which directly or indirectly follows the first in some sequence (not necessarily defined or characterised chronologically). This is a transitive relation.
comments: Connects a Proxy of a Record Resource to a Proxy of another Record Resource which directly or indirectly follows the first in some sequence (not necessarily defined or characterised chronologically). This is a transitive relation.

properties.label: publication date
properties.description: Date of the publication, in the past or in the future, of a Record Resource.
comments: Date of the publication, in the past or in the future, of a Record Resource.

properties.label: quality of representation note
properties.description: Characteristics of an Instantiation that affect the ability to recover the intellectual content. Such characteristics may be related to the methods used in creating the Instantiation or introduced subsequent to the creation through accident.
comments: Characteristics of an Instantiation that affect the ability to recover the intellectual content. Such characteristics may be related to the methods used in creating the Instantiation or introduced subsequent to the creation through accident.

properties.label: quantity
properties.description: Machine-readable quantity.
comments: Machine-readable quantity.

properties.label: rank in hierarchy
properties.description: The rank of a Record Resource, or of a Proxy that stands for it, in a hierarchy.
comments: The rank of a Record Resource, or of a Proxy that stands for it, in a hierarchy.

properties.label: rank in sequence
properties.description: The rank of a Record Resource, or of a Proxy that stands for it, in a sequence.
comments: The rank of a Record Resource, or of a Proxy that stands for it, in a sequence.

properties.label: Record Resource Extent
properties.description: The quantity of information content, as human experienced, contained in a Record Resource. The method and precision of expressing the quantity of information represented in a Record Resource will vary according to the kind of Record Resource being described, processing economy constraints, etc. For record sets, quantity may be expressed as number of records, or, for analogue records in particular, by the physical storage dimensions of the members of the Record Set. For individual records or record parts, quantity may be expressed in more precise terms.
comments: The quantity of information content, as human experienced, contained in a Record Resource. The method and precision of expressing the quantity of information represented in a Record Resource will vary according to the kind of Record Resource being described, processing economy constraints, etc. For record sets, quantity may be expressed as number of records, or, for analogue records in particular, by the physical storage dimensions of the members of the Record Set. For individual records or record parts, quantity may be expressed in more precise terms.

properties.label: Record Resource has source of information
properties.description: Connects a Record Resource to a Record Resource, when the second one is used as a source of information for producing the content of the first one.
comments: Connects a Record Resource to a Record Resource, when the second one is used as a source of information for producing the content of the first one.

properties.label: Record Resource source of information
properties.description: Information about some source on which the content of a Record Resource is based.
comments: Information about some source on which the content of a Record Resource is based.

properties.label: Record Resource structure
properties.description: Information about the intellectual arrangement and composition of a Record Resource. For Record and Record Part, it encompasses information about the intellectual composition of the record, the presence of record parts and their functions. For Record Set, it encompasses information about the methodology or criteria used for arranging the Record Set members or Record members within the containing Record Set
comments: Information about the intellectual arrangement and composition of a Record Resource. For Record and Record Part, it encompasses information about the intellectual composition of the record, the presence of record parts and their functions. For Record Set, it encompasses information about the methodology or criteria used for arranging the Record Set members or Record members within the containing Record Set

properties.label: reference system
properties.description: Framework or standard used to represent an information.
comments: Framework or standard used to represent an information.

properties.label: regulates or regulated
properties.description: Connects a Rule to a Thing that it regulates or regulated.
comments: Connects a Rule to a Thing that it regulates or regulated.

properties.label: relation certainty
properties.description: Qualifies the level of certitude of the accuracy of a Relation.
comments: Qualifies the level of certitude of the accuracy of a Relation.

properties.label: relation connects
properties.description: Connects an n-ary Relation to any of the Things involved.
comments: Connects an n-ary Relation to any of the Things involved.

properties.label: relation has context
properties.description: Connects an n-ary Relation to a Thing that is a secondary, contextual entity during the existence of the Relation.
comments: Connects an n-ary Relation to a Thing that is a secondary, contextual entity during the existence of the Relation.

properties.label: relation has date
properties.description: Connects an n-ary Relation to a Date.
comments: Connects an n-ary Relation to a Date.

properties.label: relation has source
properties.description: Connects an n-ary Relation to a Thing that is its source.
comments: Connects an n-ary Relation to a Thing that is its source.

properties.label: relation has target
properties.description: Connects an n-ary Relation to a Thing that is its target.
comments: Connects an n-ary Relation to a Thing that is its target.

properties.label: relation source
properties.description: A source of information used for identifying and describing a Relation.
comments: A source of information used for identifying and describing a Relation.

properties.label: relation state
properties.description: Used to qualify the state of a Relation (e. g. present, past, ongoing, unknown).
comments: Used to qualify the state of a Relation (e. g. present, past, ongoing, unknown).

properties.label: resulted from the merger of
properties.description: Inverse of 'was merged into' object property.
comments: Inverse of 'was merged into' object property.

properties.label: resulted from the split of
properties.description: Inverse of 'was split into' object property.
comments: Inverse of 'was split into' object property.

properties.label: results or resulted from
properties.description: Inverse of 'results or resulted in' object property.
comments: Inverse of 'results or resulted in' object property.

properties.label: results or resulted in
properties.description: Connects an Event to a Thing that results or resulted from the Event.
comments: Connects an Event to a Thing that results or resulted from the Event.

properties.label: role is context of creation relation
properties.description: Connects a Role Type to a Creation Relation (this Role Type being the specific role played by the creating Person in the context of this Relation).
comments: Connects a Role Type to a Creation Relation (this Role Type being the specific role played by the creating Person in the context of this Relation).

properties.label: rule followed
properties.description: The rule or conditions that govern the existence or lifecycle of a Thing.
comments: The rule or conditions that govern the existence or lifecycle of a Thing.

properties.label: scope and content
properties.description: Summary of the scope (such as time periods, geography) and content (such as subject matter, administrative processes) of a Record Resource. Provides a more complete summary of the informational content of the Record Resource highlighting the information conveyed in the Record Resource, why it was created, received, and/or maintained, and the agents connected to it. It may include description of relations with agents, activities, dates and places, or with other record resources.
comments: Summary of the scope (such as time periods, geography) and content (such as subject matter, administrative processes) of a Record Resource. Provides a more complete summary of the informational content of the Record Resource highlighting the information conveyed in the Record Resource, why it was created, received, and/or maintained, and the agents connected to it. It may include description of relations with agents, activities, dates and places, or with other record resources.

properties.label: sentiment or emotion expressed
properties.description: Specification of, or information about, the sentiment(s) or emotion(s) expressed by the content of a Record or a Record Part.
comments: Specification of, or information about, the sentiment(s) or emotion(s) expressed by the content of a Record or a Record Part.

properties.label: some members with accumulation date
properties.description: Date at which some of the present or past members of a Record Set were or will be accumulated.
comments: Date at which some of the present or past members of a Record Set were or will be accumulated.

properties.label: some members with creation date
properties.description: Date at which some of the present or past members of a Record Set were or will be created.
comments: Date at which some of the present or past members of a Record Set were or will be created.

properties.label: structure
properties.description: Information about the intellectual arrangement and composition of a Record Resource or the physical arrangement and composition of an Instantiation. For Record and Record Part, it encompasses information about the intellectual composition of the record, the presence of record parts and their functions. For Record Set, it encompasses information about the methodology or criteria used for arranging the Record Set members or Record members within the containing Record Set. For Instantiation, it may comprise information about the composition of the physical elements of the instantiation
comments: Information about the intellectual arrangement and composition of a Record Resource or the physical arrangement and composition of an Instantiation. For Record and Record Part, it encompasses information about the intellectual composition of the record, the presence of record parts and their functions. For Record Set, it encompasses information about the methodology or criteria used for arranging the Record Set members or Record members within the containing Record Set. For Instantiation, it may comprise information about the composition of the physical elements of the instantiation

properties.label: studies or studied at
properties.description: Connects a Person to an educational institution at which they studied or study. Both 'institution' and 'at' can be interpreted broadly.
comments: Connects a Person to an educational institution at which they studied or study. Both 'institution' and 'at' can be interpreted broadly.

properties.label: technical characteristics
properties.description: Describes any relevant physical or software feature of any device involved in the creation or management of a Record Resource.
comments: Describes any relevant physical or software feature of any device involved in the creation or management of a Record Resource.

properties.label: textual value
properties.description: A textual expression of an Appellation or Date.
comments: A textual expression of an Appellation or Date.

properties.label: thing is connected to relation
properties.description: Connects a Thing to an n-ary Relation.
comments: Connects a Thing to an n-ary Relation.

properties.label: thing is context of relation
properties.description: Connects a Thing (that is a secondary, contextual entity during the existence of the Relation) to an n-ary Relation.
comments: Connects a Thing (that is a secondary, contextual entity during the existence of the Relation) to an n-ary Relation.

properties.label: thing is source of relation
properties.description: Connects a Thing (that is the source of a Relation) to a Relation.
comments: Connects a Thing (that is the source of a Relation) to a Relation.

properties.label: thing is target of relation
properties.description: Connects a Thing (that is the target of a Relation) to an n-ary Relation.
comments: Connects a Thing (that is the target of a Relation) to an n-ary Relation.

properties.label: title
properties.description: An identifying name of a Record Resource, Instantiation or Rule.
comments: An identifying name of a Record Resource, Instantiation or Rule.

properties.label: type
properties.description: A term used to characterize an entity.
comments: A term used to characterize an entity.

properties.label: unit of measurement
properties.description: A definite magnitude of a quantity, defined and adopted by convention or by law, that is used as a standard for measurement of the same kind of quantity. Can be spacial units (cm, m), weight (g, kg), time (s, h), storage (MB, TB) or more informal units used in the archival context like number of boxes, pages or words.
comments: A definite magnitude of a quantity, defined and adopted by convention or by law, that is used as a standard for measurement of the same kind of quantity. Can be spacial units (cm, m), weight (g, kg), time (s, h), storage (MB, TB) or more informal units used in the archival context like number of boxes, pages or words.

properties.label: used from date
properties.description: Date at which an Appellation was first used.
comments: Date at which an Appellation was first used.

properties.label: used to date
properties.description: Date until an Appellation was used.
comments: Date until an Appellation was used.

properties.label: was component of
properties.description: Connects an Instantiation to another Instantiation of which it was a component in the past.
comments: Connects an Instantiation to another Instantiation of which it was a component in the past.

properties.label: was constituent of
properties.description: Connects a Record or Record Part to another Record or Record Part of which it was a constituent in the past.
comments: Connects a Record or Record Part to another Record or Record Part of which it was a constituent in the past.

properties.label: was contained by
properties.description: Connects a Place to a Place within which it was contained.
comments: Connects a Place to a Place within which it was contained.

properties.label: was included in
properties.description: Connects a Record to a Record or Record Set in which it was included in the past.
comments: Connects a Record to a Record or Record Set in which it was included in the past.

properties.label: was last updated at date
properties.description: Connects a Thing to the Date when it was last modified.
comments: Connects a Thing to the Date when it was last modified.

properties.label: was merged into
properties.description: Connects a Corporate Body to another Corporate Body that is the result of a merger of the previous one with one to many other corporate bodies.
comments: Connects a Corporate Body to another Corporate Body that is the result of a merger of the previous one with one to many other corporate bodies.

properties.label: was part of
properties.description: Connects a Thing to a Thing of which it was a constitutive or component part in the past.
comments: Connects a Thing to a Thing of which it was a constitutive or component part in the past.

properties.label: was split into
properties.description: Connects a Corporate Body to one of the Corporate Bodies that results from the split of the previous one into two to many corporate bodies.
comments: Connects a Corporate Body to one of the Corporate Bodies that results from the split of the previous one into two to many corporate bodies.

properties.label: was subdivision of
properties.description: Connects a subdivision to the Group it was a part of in the past.
comments: Connects a subdivision to the Group it was a part of in the past.

properties.label: was subevent of
properties.description: Connects a past Event to the broader Event of which it was a part.
comments: Connects a past Event to the broader Event of which it was a part.

properties.label: was subordinate to
properties.description: Connects an Agent to an Agent that was hierarchically superior in the past.
comments: Connects an Agent to an Agent that was hierarchically superior in the past.

properties.label: was used from date
properties.description: Connects an Appellation to the Date from which it was used.
comments: Connects an Appellation to the Date from which it was used.

properties.label: was used to date
properties.description: Connects an Appellation to the Date till when it was used.
comments: Connects an Appellation to the Date till when it was used.

properties.label: width
properties.description: Horizontal dimension of an entity.
comments: Horizontal dimension of an entity.
